caption.title: Model evaluation for common ragweed.
caption.p: (A) Receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curve. Red line is for the training data (AUC = 0.780), blue line is for the test data (AUC = 0.765), and black line is for a random set of predictions (AUC = 0.5). (B) Omission and predicted area curve. Red line is the fraction of background that is predicted, blue line is the omission rate for the training samples, teal line is the omission rate for the test samples, and black line is the predicted omission.
